summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing personal travel plans and a scheduled dinner. Staley mentions being on a beach without cell service and expresses hope to meet Epstein on the Island, while also referencing avoiding Palm Beach.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein about travel plans and a scheduled dinner.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley to inquire about his whereabouts and discuss their plans.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are discussing personal travel and plans to meet for dinner.

events.title: Scheduled Dinner
events.description: Jes Staley mentions a scheduled dinner with Jeffrey Epstein on January 21st.

events.title: Travel to Amsterdam
events.description: Jes Staley indicates he will be in Amsterdam on January 6.

events.title: Travel to Zurich
events.description: Jes Staley mentions being in Zurich on January 7 and 8.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is on a beach in Bahia with limited communication.
Staley expresses hope to meet Epstein on the Island.
Staley mentions avoiding Palm Beach, referring to it as a 'foreign country'.
The email indicates a scheduled dinner between Staley and Epstein on January 21st.
Staley will be traveling to Amsterdam and Zurich shortly after the email.
